name: unseen-landing
author: New Media Journalism at UC Berkeley

scripts.pull-dirtybiz: cd src/dirty-business && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-newpath: cd src/new-path && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-ontheline: cd src/on-the-line && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-pennies: cd src/pennies-per-hour && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-secondclass: cd src/second-class && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-smoke: cd src/smoke-and-mirrors && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-stolen: cd src/stolen && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-uneven: cd src/uneven-ground && git checkout master && npm ci && grunt static && git checkout site && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf assets && mv build/* ./ && rm -rf build
scripts.pull-all: npm run pull-dirtybiz && npm run pull-newpath && npm run pull-ontheline && npm run pull-pennies && npm run pull-secondclass && npm run pull-smoke && npm run pull-stolen && npm run pull-uneven
scripts.pub-all: npm run pull-all && npm run publish
